title: Gigi and Bella Hadid make a stylish pair as they join Kacey Musgraves backstage
text:
They are all firm pals.

So naturally, Gigi and Bella Hadid joined country singer Kacey Musgraves backstage as she performed in New York on Wednesday night.

The style-icon sisters looked their very best for their night out at Radio City, with Bella rocking a retro orange snakeskin blouse, and brown corduroy pants.

Night out: Gigi and Bella Hadid make a stylish pair as they join Kacey Musgraves backstage at her New York concert on Wednesday

On trend: The style-icon sisters looked their very best for their night out at Radio City, with Bella rocking a retro orange snakeskin blouse, and brown corduroy pants

Gigi was on brand in a Kacey merchandise sweater and ripped jeans, with multiple gold chains around her neck.

The Hadid sisters were joined by their 'godsister', Olivia Perez, who Bella revealed 'was in the room when I was born'.

Perez is a former flatmate of Bella, and close childhood friend of the Hadids.

Super fan: Gigi was on brand in a Kacey merchandise sweater and ripped jeans, with multiple gold chains around her neck

Yeehaw! Gigi wore blue cowboy boots for the country singer's show

All dressed up: The Hadids made the most of their night out

The trio took to their Instagram stories Wednesday as they attended Musgraves' concert at Radio City Music Hall in New York City.

Bella posted footage of them as they sang along to the artist's hit tracks Space Cowboy and Wonder Woman.

The women also hung out backstage with Musgraves before and after the performance.

Fan girls: Gigi and Bella Hadid took to their Instagram stories Wednesday as they attended Kacey Musgraves' concert with pal Olivia Perez

Bella was beaming in one photo as she struck a pose in the vanity mirror of the dressing room.

Another blurry snap shows Gigi showing off her metallic blue cowboy boots, appropriately captioned: 'yeehaw.'

She also showed off the boots in a photo of the Radio City Music Hall rug, as they stood outside before the show.

Singalong: Bella posted footage of them as they sang along to the artist's hit tracks Space Cowboy and Wonder Woman

Backstage pass: Bella was beaming in one photo as she struck a pose backstage in the vanity mirror of the dressing room

Yee-haw vibes: Another blurry snap shows Gigi trying on a pair of metallic blue boots, appropriately captioned: 'yeehaw'

Boot scootin': She also showed off the boots in a photo of the Radio City Music Hall rug, as they stood outside before the show

Gigi took to her story after the show as she lounged around, listening to Musgraves while sporting her T-shirt.

The Texan is currently on the second leg of her Oh, What a World tour, which is headed to Nashville next.

She took home four Grammy Awards this year, including Best Country Album and Album of the Year for Golden Hour.
description: The style-icon sisters looked their very best for their night out at Radio City, with Bella rocking a retro orange snakeskin blouse, and brown corduroy pants.
